gh.            Seminoma extragonadal germ cell tumor does not have a poor prognosis group.",CancerGov,Extragonadal Germ Cell Tumors
What are the treatments for Extragonadal Germ Cell Tumors ?,"Key Points
                    - There are different types of treatment for patients with extragonadal germ cell tumors.    - Three types of standard treatment are used:         - Radiation therapy     - Chemotherapy     - Surgery        - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.
